snippet.title: The House of Da Vinci VR Coming to Meta Quest Devices
snippet.description:
We're thrilled to announce that the best-selling PC 3D puzzle adventure trilogy The House of Da Vinci will launch for Meta Quest VR devices via the Meta Store and Steam later in 2024. In The House of Da Vinci VR, prepare to be transported to 16th century Italy where for the first time you can explore Da Vinci’s mechanical puzzles and bizarre inventions with your hands and discover the secrets of his workshop. 

More info & Wishlist on Steam now.
